title: Item Component Schema
description: Core component identifying an entity as an item and its basic properties (tags, stackability, value, weight).

tags.description: Keywords identifying the item's type, material, or purpose (e.g., 'key', 'potion', 'weapon', 'metal', 'quest_item'). Used for filtering and identification.

stackable.description: Whether multiple instances stack in inventory (requires quantity tracking elsewhere, perhaps on the InventoryComponent slot).

value.description: Optional base monetary or point value.

weight.description: Optional weight value, affecting inventory capacity.
